title: Jeremy Corbyn is urged to block early election, with Labour split on a winter poll
text:
Jeremy Corbyn has been urged to block an election until Spring next year, as Labour claimed yesterday it could not trust Boris Johnson over the date of a poll.

The Labour leader has been warned he faces a full-scale rebellion if he agrees to a snap poll, after several of his allies insisted they wanted to go to the country before Christmas.

It came as the Prime Minister yesterday put the country on an election footing, with Downing Street sources insisting he would “go for a general election” if EU leaders granted a Brexit extension until Jan 31.

Mr Corbyn has repeatedly said that he would back an election if a three month delay is granted by Brussels, as set out in the Benn Act, the legislation...
description: Jeremy Corbyn has been urged to block an election until Spring next year, as Labour claimed yesterday it could not trust Boris Johnson over the date of a poll.
